library(tidyverse)
edges_df <- read_csv("local-data/edges.csv") |> select(-"...1")
nodes_df <- read_csv("local-data/nodes.csv") |> select(-"...1")

head(edges_df)

title: Structured intelligence governance template
text: system overview

title: Structured intelligence governance template
text:
workflow


Click to expand
library(ggraph)
library(tidygraph)

edges_df %>%
  select(from, to, to_minimum_requirements, arrowkeeper, status) %>%
  as_tbl_graph() %>%
  activate("nodes") %>%
  left_join(nodes_df, by = c("name" = "node")) %>%
  ggraph() +
  geom_node_point(aes(shape = role_context),
    size = 20, alpha = 0.1
  ) +
  geom_node_text(aes(label = name)) +
  geom_edge_link(
    aes(linetype = arrowkeeper, color = status)
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(),
    axis.text = element_blank(),
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.direction = "vertical"
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "Structured intelligence governance",
    subtitle = "Roles and contexts",
    x = "",
    y = ""
  )


Error in `geom_node_point()`:
! Problem while computing aesthetics.
ℹ Error occurred in the 1st layer.
Caused by error:
! object 'role_context' not found

title: Structured intelligence governance template
text:
relationships


Click to expand
library(ggraph)
library(tidygraph)


edges_df %>%
  select(from, to, to_minimum_requirements, arrowkeeper, status) %>%
  as_tbl_graph() %>%
  activate("nodes") %>%
  left_join(nodes_df, by = c("name" = "node")) %>%
  ggraph(layout = "linear", circular = TRUE) +
  geom_node_point(aes(shape = role_context),
    size = 20, alpha = 0.1
  ) +
  geom_node_text(aes(label = name), size = 10) +
  geom_edge_arc(
    aes(linetype = arrowkeeper, color = status)
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(),
    axis.text = element_blank(),
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.direction = "vertical"
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "Structured intelligence governance",
    subtitle = "Roles and contexts",
    x = "",
    y = ""
  )


Error in `geom_node_point()`:
! Problem while computing aesthetics.
ℹ Error occurred in the 1st layer.
Caused by error:
! object 'role_context' not found

library(gt)

edges_df %>%
  filter(arrowkeeper == "analytics", status != "operational") %>%
  select(-arrowkeeper) %>%
  gt()








from
to
to_minimum_requirements
status




tools
scientists
Scientists need a scientific workflow tools such as scikitlearn, as well as overlapping toolkits with analytics. Scientists need to access data via tools to ensure GDPR and other ethics concerns are adhered to.
not developed


scientists

Communicates data collection requirements.
not developed

scientists

sig_dat = SigDat()




Click to expand
print(SigDat.__doc__)



    Data preparation layer for SIG (Structured Intelligence Governance).
    Focuses on loading raw data and preparing clean node and edge dataframes.

    This function will not work if client_credentials/.env does not have 
    DATA_ENTRY variable set.
